refsect1.title: Using GTK with Wayland
refsect1.para: The GDK Wayland backend provides support for running GTK applications under the Wayland display server. To run your application in this way, select the Wayland backend by setting GDK_BACKEND=wayland.
Currently, the Wayland backend does not use any additional commandline options or environment variables.
For up-to-date information about the current status of this backend, see the project page.
